Package Game

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
Game.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
ALL GAME STUFF REVOLVES AROUND HERE.. A class to keep game components and manages screen manipulations.
Author:
ilkan Mert Okul

    • swapController

      private void swapController​(ColoredNode node)
      This method controls the avaiability of swapping of chosen nodes. It prints some information if it is not possible to swap two nodes.
      Parameters:
      node - chosen node
